info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 08 at 3:40PM MST until May 08 at 5:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 545 PM MST. * At 337 PM MST, a dust channel was 10 miles west of Hermit's Rest At Grand Canyon, or southwest of Meadview, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Pierce Ferry Road between Dolan Springs and Grand Canyon Skywalk. Locations impacted include... Grand Canyon Ranch, Grand Canyon Skywalk, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, Meadview, Dolan Springs and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
